Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775U)

Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"" Do ..WriteTitlePane("@Ensemble:ASTMManagerRawDocumentStructure@Ensemble ASTM Raw Document Structure") Write !,"
" Write !,!,"
" Write "ASTM Raw Document Structure definition is displayed below:" Write "
" Write !,"
",! Write ! #include EnsEDIASTM set ds=%request.Get("DS") set category=$p(ds,":",2) set secondary=$p(ds,":",3) If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set description=..EscapeHTML(##class(EnsLib.ASTM.Schema).GetDescription(ds)) if $data($$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"DS",secondary))=0 { write ""_ds_" Definition does not exist!",! quit } } Write !,!,""_(category_":"_secondary)_" "_($G(description))_"",! Write "

",! Write ! If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { Set struct=$$$vaSchemaGbl(category,"CS",secondary) write "Raw Definition:" write "",! write "" write "
"_struct_"
" write "
" } Write !,!,"

",! Write "" Write "(Show All Categories)" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show All Document Structures in category '"_(category)_"')" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show Definition diagram)" Write "" Write !,!,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Ensemble ASTM Raw Document Structure</title>",! Write "<link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""/csp/sys/csputils.css"" title=""Standard Style""/>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
